'''''kwāră''''' (alternative form '''''kwārē''''')  is a [[Primitive Quendian]] word for "fist of hand".<ref name=PM>{{PM|Dwarves}}, p. 318 (note 7)</ref><ref name=VT>{{VT|47a}}, pp. 8, 22 (note 21)</ref><ref name=PE17>{{PE|17}}, pp. 42, 158</ref>

==Etymology==
The word derives from [[Sundocarme|root]] [[KWAR]].<ref name=PM/><ref name=VT/>

==Derivatives==
*[[Quenya]] ''[[quár]]''
*[[Telerin]] ''[[pār]]''
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[paur]]''
